hero.title: Welcome to ElKhalifa Cargo
hero.description: Welcome to ElKhalifa Cargo, your trusted partner in shipping and logistics solutions since 1969. With over 50 years of experience, we offer fully integrated services including air and sea freight, customs clearance, transportation, warehousing, and insurance, both locally and internationally. We don’t just move goods, we deliver trust, precision, and commitment in every shipment.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Choose the right service for your needs and let us take care of the rest.

customs.name: Customs Clearance
customs.desc: We ensure fast and secure clearance for all shipments through customs ports.

air.name: Air Freight
air.desc: The fastest solution is to get your goods delivered anywhere in the world.

sea.name: Sea Freight
sea.desc: Flexible international shipping options through all major ports.

special.name: Special Cargo
special.desc: Expert handling of sensitive, oversized, or complex shipments.

insurance.name: Insurance
insurance.desc: Full protection for your shipment against risks, locally and globally.

packing.name: Packing
packing.desc: Professional packing that protects your cargo, no matter the type.

storage.name: Storage
storage.desc: Secure and flexible storage solutions tailored to your cargo needs.

door.name: Door-to-Door
door.desc: Complete delivery from origin to destination, fast, direct, and reliable.

footer.address: 43 Asmaa Fahmy st., Ard El-Golf, Heliopolis, Cairo, Egypt
footer.copyright: Copyright 2025 © Khalifa Cargo — Developed by Sedra Media

faq.question: Which countries do you ship to?
faq.answer: We ship to most countries worldwide, with a focus on the Gulf region, Europe, and the US. Contact us to confirm your destination.

faq.question: What types of shipping do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer air, sea, and land freight options depending on destination and budget.

faq.question: How long does shipping take?
faq.answer: Shipping time varies by destination. Contact us for an accurate quote.

faq.question: How can I track my shipment?
faq.answer: We provide tracking links or direct updates via email/WhatsApp.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept wire transfer, credit card, and cash payments in Egypt.
